nodes.description: How do you know that you are in love with someone? Do you feel confused right now? You can find some clarity by checking out the signs that you are in love.

thumbnail.alternativeText: How to Tell If You Love Someone (7 Signs Youâ€™re in Love)

nodes.title: It is possible to tell if you love someone

data.body:
## The signs of being in [love](there-is-a-way-to-express-love-to-an-unfaithful-partner)

Is it possible that you are in love with someone but don't know the signs?

I am familiar with the differences between lust, the roller-coaster ride of limerence, and the soft security of a long-term love.

 How do you know you're in love with someone? When it is not just a simple crush, but real love, how can you tell?

 This can be something that is not objective. If we are going to look at being in love as a deeper, longer-term state, then there are some consistent signs.

### This article is about it

data.body:
## There are seven signs that you are in love

 Around the time you transition away from your initial feelings of lust or a superficial crush, you will start to realize you love someone. When you start seeing the person in a multi-dimensional light, instead of just being an object for your affection, it is when your feelings get a bit more serious.

 How do you know how much you love someone? This has started to happen for you, here are some signs.

### You don't need to put your lover on a pedestal anymore

You have transitioned from seeing the person as an image of your ideal to seeing them as a whole human being, which is the main sign that you are in love.

 People are put on a pedestal when we have a crush. They are more than just a person, and many times we overlook their negative qualities. We may make excuses for the things that are bad about them.

 Humans are complex and messy. Human beings have the ability to change. Human beings are not the only ones who have flaws.

There are two things that can happen when you realize this truth in your partner.

 The image fades sooner or later. If your relationship really has long-term potential, this is the fork in the road. As you get to know each other, you will have to come down the facade.

data.body:
### You feel more relaxed around your partner

When hanging out with a crush, do you ever feel nervous?

 You don't know them very well yet. You might be unsure if they feel the same way. A mystery between you is the source of a lot of the sparks. The unknown and unpredictable are attractive to people. People are fond of having their curiosity tickled.

 This can lead you into deeper states of love, and it is exciting. After falling in love, you can still be interested in your partner. Some people are married for decades and still learning from each other.

 There is usually more trust when you are in love. The person is relaxing around you. You don't feel like you're in danger. It kind of doesn't matter if they feel the same way.

This is our next point...

### You don't have an obsessive interest in reciprocation

 All of us want our partners to reciprocate. Who doesn't want to be following someone around for money?

 When you are in love with someone, you don't have to worry about how they will react. You can accept it and still be in love if they don't feel the same way. If you think that they would have a better life with someone else, you can wish them the best and let them go.

Being in love and in need of someone's attention are two different things.

 If you have an obsessive crush, it can be difficult to imagine this. People tend to be possessive when it comes to crushes. You don't want the person to pay attention to you if they don't reciprocate and you feel jealous if they don't pay attention to other people.

 Being jealous is normal. A society where most people are monogamous means that you can't have them, and you're only human. It is more important to have a healthy connection between you when you are in love than it is to have possession. You don't care about finding a way to make someone love you more than others. A relationship with the person is what you want. You want to know who the person is. This is completely different from the other ones.

 You worry about how to control the situation in order to get the result you want when you are obsessed with someone. You can let things flow as they are meant to when you are in love.

data.body:
### Building the relationship is the focus of your attention

 What the person can do for you and what special feelings they have for you are what makes a crush. It's fun entertaining the crush. You can say that you are using the person as an excuse to feel good, but in reality it is a personal experience that you are having with yourself. Even if you don't know a celebrity, you can feel good about having a crush.

 This isn't bad. It's normal for people to get to know someone they like, but eventually they'll lose their glasses. You will have to decide whether to build a relationship with the person or not.

 A person interested in an actual relationship is in love. You are interested in knowing who the person is and not just trying to make them feel better. Our next point spills into this.

### At the first sign of trouble, you should not run away

 Love can be fault tolerant. Negative emotions and confrontation can be overcome by love. superficial feelings and assumptions aren't quite so robust when it comes to crushes.

 It's easy to fall apart from a relationship based on a crush. A person living up to an idealized version of themselves is why crushes are not very flexible. If the person acts in a way that you didn't expect, the good feelings disappear as soon as the heart-shaped bubble pops.

 You are more willing to work things out if you are in love with someone. Underneath the superficial stuff, you have feelings for them. As the weather changes, you could say that love is something that is beneath the storm of emotions and can stand up. When the weather changes, there is a crush in the clouds that will fall.

data.body:
### You do not feel like you have to change yourself

 You can be who you are when you are truly in love. You don't want the other person to think you're trying to impress them. Changing yourself to impress someone else is actually a form of manipulation, even if you don't look at it that way.

 Real love isn't manipulation. Real love allows you to be who you are and who your partner is. You wouldn't compromise yourself for the other person because you know they don't deserve the real you.

 You will find it difficult to love other people if you don't love yourself. Both of you will be sucked dry by needy attachment.

### You feel filled but not full of desire

 You will feel a mix of emotions when you are crushing on a person. When you see your crush looking at someone else, you can feel high, but then you can feel low.

 It's like a drug when you're around them. It is a very surface-level experience, but it is fun and unpredictable. It is not what you want it to be. It is like your brain created a need for them that you cannot satisfy.

 Being around someone you love will give you a more peaceful sense of joy than if you were alone. It won't be all of the time, but there will be moments of negative emotion, but the distinction is that it won't be so extreme.

Love is not very loud, but it is very deep.

 You tend to feel more confident when you're in love. Your feelings are not based on what you want, but on what you already have: love.

You tend to feel more confident when you're in love. Your feelings are not based on what you want, but on what you already have: love.

data.body:
## How to tell the difference between lust and love

 How do you tell the difference between love and lust in your situation? What is the litmus test for when you are in love and not just viewing the person as someone to be possessed?

### Are you just filling in the blanks?

 Do you think there is something missing in your partner? They have a longing that they satisfy. When they are around, is it a hunger or thirst?

 That could be a crush or lust. They are similar to a person who is addicted to you.

### Do they add anything to your life?

 Do you think your partner makes a difference in your life? They don't really quench an obsessive desire in you when they are gone. You get a lot out of having them in your life because you don't need them.

That could be love.

### Can you not have both?

 Is it possible to have both at the same time? Some people experience this. Some people don't let go of their needy feelings, and this can cause their relationship to break down or even become codependency.

 Sometimes a relationship can evolve into a healthy dynamic, but still have feelings of lust. If you see your partner as a full human being and don't turn the lustful feelings into everything they are to you, then that's fine. Relationships will be like this most of the time.

## Do you know if you are in love?

Pick the best answer to the question.

### There was a scoring

 Add the number of points indicated for each of the possible results to the answer you selected. The greatest number of points at the end is what your final result will be.

The table shows the meaning of the result.

It is most likely in love.

 If you are in love with your partner, chances are high. It's good for you, remember that you could still have some feelings. As the relationship progresses, things may change.

It's possible to be in Lust or have a crush.

 You are crushing on your partner at the beginning of a relationship. That is absolutely fine. It is just a stage and may lead to real love later on. You can still have feelings. As the relationship progresses, things may change.

It seems like it is not interested.

 You seem so detached that maybe you are just not interested. If you're not into someone, don't force yourself to be with them.
